entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
